description: Whether you're the last one up telling stories or the first one up making coffee, the HiCamp™ Fleece Vest is ready to chase away that chilly nip in the air. This lightweight, high-loft Sherpa fleece vest features a classic design with plenty of pocket storage to keep all of your camp essentials at the ready.
name: Mountain Hardwear HiCamp Fleece Vest - Mens
